channel.title: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S
channel.description: I am as anxious as anyone on this forum to play the game....although waiting kinda makes me sad...but the longer in production...the better the game....just as long as its not tooo long in production...like duke nukem forever...but while waiting, i've been finding ways to cope...playing touhou and "I wanna be the guy" as well as revisiting my past games like F.E.A.R. and doom 3....sooo what 'bout you guys? ^_^

item.title: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S
item.dc:creator: Xenomorphlover
item.description:
If you dont want to wait to play in the “Black Mesa facility” you should check out this mod here…a demo should be out today or the next few days:

https://www.moddb.com/mods/wilson-chronicles

It seems that the setting of this mod is Black Mesa and that should give us a little time to prepare before we can move and jump around in the “real” facility at the end of this year (fingers crossed)…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Eion_Kilant_739
item.description:
I can wait for it by Beating my run through Half-Life then Half-Life 2, Gmod (TTT, Deathrun, Garyware, RP, Prison RP, etc.), Halo: Reach (9/14/2010), Halo 3 (before Reach comes out), MW 1, and reading.

item.title: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S
item.dc:creator: Albert
item.description:
Haha… a good question.

Well, play another FPS, drink, look the progression of “BM:S”, stay out with friends.

And the most important thing, pass the Half Life 1 in record time, the last time I pass this game, was in 1 hour and 31 minutes (Kill a lot, and don’t use the bugs of the maps)

Read full topic

item.title: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S
item.dc:creator: RandomGuy_NOR
item.description:
DURGZ BEIBEH
No. Seriously.
I play games. Eat stuff. Play half-life 2. Make a soundpack in almost all of the source games with my own voice. Play the games with the soundpacks. Getting a new game now and then. Make a music video now and then. And it goes on…

“…drink so much you black out… so badly you’ll forget everything about the original half life…”

Best answer I’ve seen.

item.source: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S

item.title: Ways to cope while waiting for BM:S
item.dc:creator: Mike712
item.description:
First post, Hi everyone o/

Drink heavily! It will pass the time, if you can drink so much you black out occasionally even better, less perceived time waiting for release.

Hopefully you’ll damage you’re brain so badly you’ll forget everything about the original half life and when you come to play Black Mesa it will be even more exciting!
